==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|さと|おや|yomi=kun}}

===Pronunciation===
* {{IPA|/satooya/|lang=ja}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{m|ja|里|sato|village}} and {{m|ja|親|oya|parent}}. Often cited in contrast to {{m|ja|砂糖屋|satōya|sugar dealer}} in discussion of the phonological distinction between long vowels and geminate vowels.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|さと.おや}}

# a foster parent
